roomTypes.roomTypeDesc:
45 sq. m./484 sq. ft., sound-proof windows, WiFi, 55-inch LCD TV, walk-in rain shower, separate bath

Lounge in the comfortable sitting area and watch entertaining TV shows and movies on the 55-inch LCD TV. Work at ease with the desk and ergonomic chair or surf the web with WiFi access.

Re-energize in the elegant bathroom with bathtub, separate walk-in rain shower and refreshing bathroom amenities. This comfortable room features floor-to-ceiling sound-proof windows to minimize airport noise. Guests can take advantage of the room's personal humidifier in Beijing's dry winter season. Special touches include bathrobe and slippers.

roomTypes.roomTypeName: Family Room with 2.7m*2.0m King Plus Bed
roomTypes.roomTypeDesc:
45 sq m/484 sq ft, high floor, king-sized bed, WiFi, separate shower and bath.

Stylishly furnished, this spacious room averaging 45 sq. m/484 sq. ft. and with a 3.5m/11.5 ft. high ceiling is sealed from airport noise by a sound-proofed floor-to-ceiling window, meaning comfort is assured over Beijing's dry winter air.

Relax in your comfortable sitting area and watch satellite channels on the flat panel TV or use the work area to check emails with WiFi access. The luxurious bathroom features a full-size bathtub and separate compartments for walk-in rain shower and toilet. Tea/coffee-making facilities along with iron/ironing board are standard.
roomTypes.name: Family Room with 2.7m*2.0m King Plus Bed

thumbnail.altText: Guestroom Lounge Area with Sofa, Work Desk and Outside View

roomTypes.roomTypeDesc:
Executive benefits, complimentary breakfast, 55-inch LCD TV, WiFi, separate bath and shower

Relax in this sound-proofed room and enjoy TV shows on the 55-inch LCD TV. Catch up on work at the convenient desk with ergonomic chair or send emails with WiFi.

Unwind in the stylish bathroom with bathtub, separate rain shower and refreshing bathroom amenities. Enjoy the complimentary bathrobe and slippers and utilize the room's personal humidifier in Beijing's dry winter season.

Enjoy exclusive access to the Executive Lounge to take advantage of a personalized check-in/check-out service, computers with internet connection, access to meeting rooms (free for 1 hour) and WiFi. Enjoy complimentary breakfast, snacks and evening cocktails.

roomTypes.name: King Hilton Executive

roomTypes.roomTypeDesc:
75 sq. m./807 sq. ft., living room, washroom, bathroom TV, Executive benefits, WiFi

This stylish suite features a high-ceiling living room with separate washroom and large sound-proof windows. Stay comfortable in Beijing's dry winters with a personal humidifier and air conditioning.

  • Relax in front of the 55-inch LCD TV with multiple TV channels
  • Work in comfort with the large desk, ergonomic chair and WiFi access
  • Take a relaxing bath and watch a movie on the bathroom HDTV

Relax in the bathroom with bathtub, separate rain shower and refreshing bathroom amenities. Take advantage of Executive Lounge access where you can savor complimentary hot breakfast and various refreshments.
roomTypes.name: King Deluxe Suite

roomTypes.roomTypeDesc:
88 sq. m. /947 sq. ft., sound-proof windows, living area, WiFi, Executive benefits

This 88 sq. m./947 sq. ft. suite boasts a comfortable living area with a 55-inch LCD TV where guests can unwind to watch TV and movies. Use the large work space with ergonomic chair and WiFi to catch up on business. Refresh in the stylish washroom connected to the living space.

Revitalize in the elegant bathroom with bathtub, separate rain shower, refreshing bathroom amenities and bathroom TV. Head to the Executive Lounge for complimentary breakfast, refreshments and a personalized check-in/check-out service.

This stylish room features floor-to-ceiling sound-proof windows to minimize airport noise. Utilize the personal humidifier in Beijing's dry winter season. Special touches include bathrobe and slippers.
roomTypes.name: King Premier Suite

roomTypes.roomTypeDesc:
130 sq. m./1,399 sq. ft., split-level, Executive benefits, bathroom TV, two bathrooms, WiFi

This stylish suite is divided between two levels with a king bed, two double beds and two bathrooms for optimum space and comfort. The suite features a 7m high ceiling and large sound-proof window in the living area.

  • Unwind in front of the 55-inch LCD TV with top TV channels
  • Work at ease with the large desk, ergonomic chair and WiFi access
  • Enjoy a movie on the bathroom HD TV

Indulge yourself in the bathrooms with bathtub, separate rain shower, and refreshing bathroom amenities. Take advantage of Executive Lounge access where you can enjoy complimentary breakfast and various refreshments.
